pages.text: The $(item)Battery Replenisher$() is a simple machine that will fill empty or partially depleted $(item)Energion Batteries$() with $(item)Energion Dust$(). It needs to be provided with $(thing)Hot Air$() to work, and can only fill a single $(item)Energion Battery$() at a time.$(br2)$(item)Energion Batteries$() to fill and $(item)Energion Dust$() can be inserted and full $(item)Energion Batteries$() can be extracted from any side except the top and bottom.
